Text: Does the image ask for a serial number?? Would it work on a XPS laptop???

Yes, this will work on an XPS. I have it working on one of my own.

No, it will not ask for a serial number.
will it work on a virtual machine?
No, VMs will not work because VMs aren't Dell PCs ;)
Hm. Seems to be using Vistaloader. By the way Dell OEM is kind of nonsense, Dells have a SLIC table in the bios so only the right key and certificate is needed.
bootloader.. not cool stating this is a Dell OEM image.
turn2dust are you saying it has some addon bootloader with bickering written in it?

Works Thanks mm3_hellraiser and also you can get this working on any computer. All you need is a coa key on the bottom of a dell computer. The only bad thing is you get all the dell programs and your computer will think its a dell pc. But it still works :)
